lead_paragraph: United States Ryder Cup captain Davis Love III says he will take a leaf out of 2008 skipper Paul Azinger's book before he announces his four wildcard picks for this year's competition against holders Europe.

headline.print_headline: Love to Follow Azinger's Lead With Captain's Cup Picks
headline.main: Love to Follow Azinger's Lead With Captain's Cup Picks

snippet: United States Ryder Cup captain Davis Love III says he will take a leaf out of 2008 skipper Paul Azinger's book before he announces his four wildcard picks for this year's competition against holders Europe....
